book.synopsis: Bentley traces Blake from his natal landscape, youth, marriage, and apprenticeship through to his later years as a working engraver, poet, and radical visionary. Bentley is academic and thorough
book.title_long: The Stranger from Paradise: A Biography of William Blake (Paul Mellon Centre for Studies in British Art)
